explanation: [0-0] A woman in pink and white clothes is standing at the bottom of the concrete steps in front of a house. She is holding a metal bowl and a spoon with food in it. In front of the woman sit two people, a boy wearing a blue hat and a man in gray clothes, both with plates in front of them.
[0-2] The woman then pours the food into the boy's plate and turns to leave. The boy grabs the food on his plate with his hand, while the man looks up with his mouth open and one hand raised.
